Package com.netflix.genie.server.jobmanager

Interfaces for job management

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    JobJanitor
    Janitor thread that marks jobs as zombies if status hasn't been updated for the configured timeout.
    JobManager
    The interface to be implemented by job manager implementations.
    JobMonitor
    Interface for the runnable which monitors a job.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JobManagerFactory
    Factory class to instantiate individual job managers.
